Package access.officerregistration

Class OfficerRegistrationHandler

java.lang.Object
access.officerregistration.OfficerRegistrationHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ManagerOfficerRegistrationFeatures, OfficerRegistrationApplicantFeatures
public class OfficerRegistrationHandler extends Object implements ManagerOfficerRegistrationFeatures, OfficerRegistrationApplicantFeatures
Handles all officer registration operations in the BTO Management System. Implements interfaces for managers and officers to provide role-appropriate access to registration functionality and data.

  • Method Details

    • getAllOfficerRegistrations

      public List<OfficerRegistration> getAllOfficerRegistrations()
      Returns all officer registrations in the system. Available to managers for oversight of officer assignments.
      Specified by:
      getAllOfficerRegistrations in interface ManagerOfficerRegistrationFeatures
      Returns:
      A list of all OfficerRegistration objects

    • approveRegistration

      public void approveRegistration(String registrationId)
      Approves an officer's registration for a project. Available to managers as part of the officer assignment process.
      Specified by:
      approveRegistration in interface ManagerOfficerRegistrationFeatures
      Parameters:
      registrationId - The ID of the registration to approve
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the registration is not found

    • rejectRegistration

      public void rejectRegistration(String registrationId)
      Rejects an officer's registration for a project. Available to managers as part of the officer assignment process.
      Specified by:
      rejectRegistration in interface ManagerOfficerRegistrationFeatures
      Parameters:
      registrationId - The ID of the registration to reject
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the registration is not found

    • applyForOfficerRegistration

      public void applyForOfficerRegistration(OfficerRegistration registration)
      Submits a new officer registration application. Available to officers to register for project assignment.
      Specified by:
      applyForOfficerRegistration in interface OfficerRegistrationApplicantFeatures
      Parameters:
      registration - The registration to submit
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the officer is not eligible for the project

    • getRegistrationsForOfficer

      public List<OfficerRegistration> getRegistrationsForOfficer(String officerNric)
      Returns all registrations submitted by a specific officer. Available to officers to view their registration history.
      Specified by:
      getRegistrationsForOfficer in interface OfficerRegistrationApplicantFeatures
      Parameters:
      officerNric - The NRIC of the officer
      Returns:
      A list of OfficerRegistration objects submitted by the specified officer

    • saveChanges

      public void saveChanges()
      Saves current registration data to persistent storage. Called after operations that modify registration data.
